structure.unit: LEVEES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION OF LANDS
MISCELLANEOUS PROVISIONS AS TO DITCHES, DRAINAGE, AND RECLAMATION

law.text: Any drainage, levee or reclamation district may comply with or avail itself of the provisions of any legislation enacted by Congress to refund or extend the time of payment of the bonded indebtedness of any district or otherwise lighten the burden of taxation resting on the property in the district.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2380d-8.
